form.name: pain_on_urination_dribbling_urine
form.page_subtitle: PNC Diagnostic Mother: PNC Management of Danger Signs> Pain on urination/dribbling urine

field.name: Refer client to a health center or hospital IMMEDIATELY
Record clinical information in client’s maternal health or “Red” book. If possible, also fill out referral form
Accompany mother and have a family member accompany mother to the health facility
Follow up with client after discharge from health center or hospital
